# Discord Chat Analysis for üßä‚îÇ3d-design Channel

## 1. Summary:
The discussion primarily focused on a technical limitation in Hyperfy regarding the rendering distance of large 3D models. Mugenomics encountered an issue where parts of a massive spaceship model (approximately 1600m long) were being clipped at around 1000m distance. After initial troubleshooting, it was determined that this was not a Level of Detail (LOD) issue as Mugenomics had set the LOD to 10,000 in Blender. Instead, the problem was identified as a limitation of the skybox, which has a radius of approximately 1km and moves with the player. This causes any objects beyond that distance to be clipped. Ashxn confirmed this technical limitation and mentioned future plans to make the sky customizable as an app. As a temporary workaround, Shiffty suggested using fog effects to mask the clipping issue, particularly near the horizon.

## 2. FAQ:
Q: Is there any way to increase the draw distance? (asked by Mugenomics) A: The skybox has a 1km radius and moves with the player, causing clipping beyond that distance. Future plans include making the sky an app for customization. (answered by Ashxn)
Q: Could it be a LOD (level of detail) issue with the model? (asked by maximus) A: No, the LOD is set to 10,000 in Blender, and only portions of the model disappear rather than the whole model. (answered by Mugenomics)

## 3. Help Interactions:
Helper: Shiffty | Helpee: Mugenomics | Context: Large model being clipped by skybox | Resolution: Suggested using fog as a temporary solution to mask the clipping issue
Helper: Ashxn | Helpee: Mugenomics | Context: Understanding why large models clip at distance | Resolution: Explained the technical limitation of the 1km radius skybox that moves with the player

## 4. Action Items:
Feature: Make the sky an app so users can delete/modify it | Description: Allow customization of the skybox to address clipping issues with large models | Mentioned By: Ashxn
Technical: Implement fog effects | Description: Use fog as a workaround for skybox clipping issues with large models | Mentioned By: Shiffty

Key technical additions include a new loading screen with world image settings, Open Graph tag support, VR controller interaction improvements, and experimental terrain support using splatmaps.
